item.description:
IMPORTANT EVENT INFORMATION UPDATE: On-line ticket sales on the redsox natives site close at 3:00 P.M. today. There will be plenty of tickets available at the entrance to the red sox natives reserved section at the event. Scoreboard will be busy. Please arrive early if you can in order to avoid any lines later in the evening since the band is popular. All are welcome. Bring guests, friends and fans. Additional raffle tickets will be available for purchase during the event. I just wrote Mindy a check for $60.00 worth of raffle tickets. You do not need to be present to win the raffle prizes. The Red Sox Natives look forward to seeing you at Scoreboard tonight.  

***This event has been announced to 8 groups. Please update your RSVPs. Raffle prizes have been added.***

The event is being sponsored by Lauren from our venue host Scoreboard, Coach Henry from Henrys Baseball Club.com in Waltham and Jay from Boston Uncorked wine tasting events.

Last year over 50 people attended and had a blast so it's on for 2012! We already have over 60 RSVPs.

By this time the demons of the 2011 season will have been exorcised!

Please join my Red Sox Natives Meetup for our Second Annual Spring Training Kick-Off Happy Hour and Party at 6:00 pm on Saturday, March 24 at Scoreboard Sports Bar and Grille in Woburn as we prepare for the 2012 Red Sox season and say goodbye to winter with live music from Spike The Punch Band.

If you have never been to Scoreboard, it is located at 15 Middlesex Canal Park Lane next to the Holiday Inn and Showcase Cinema off Route 128 in Woburn. Scoreboard has 30 High Definition and Plasma TVs ranging in size from 50 to 92 inches. More info at http;//www.tpsscoreboard.com.

Join the Red Sox Natives at Scoreboard if you are a Red Sox fan or Baseball fan. Join us if you are a Boston Happy Hour Drinking Buddy looking for a different suburban venue. Join us if you like the new Scoreboard. Join us if you have something Baseball to promote. Join us if you are sick of winter and like the band Spike The Punch.

More information on the redsoxnatives and this event as well as how to purchase tickets can be found on the redsoxnatives meetup or on redsoxnatives.com

It promises to be a busy night starting at 6:00 pm with:

Complimentary popcorn, chicken (a Josh Beckett favorite) and treats provided by Scoreboard. There is a Cash Bar.      

Meet & Greet with Red Sox Natives Founder, Co-Organizers and Assistant organizers and special guests.

Meet Native and Boston Happy Hour Drinking Buddy Mindy Finkelstien who is representing the Natives on May 20 in The Run To Home Base 9k at Fenway Park. Complete Details are on the Natives calendar.

Any optional donations to Mindy's $1,000.00 Mandatory Fundraising Goal will get you more raffle tickets for wine, Sox/Yankees tickets,  a pair of tickets to the 7th Anniversary Boston Uncorked Wine Tasting Party at Forum on April 11, redsox scratch tickets...

After 9:00 PM stick around for optional dinner, drinks and dancing with live music provided by Spike The Punch.

Scoreboard will be packed after 8:00 pm.

Please remember to tip your servers and maintain your own food and bar tab.

Join us early or later. Early is better to avoid lines and take advantage of the entire event. Wear your Sox gear. Bring cool guests and fans.

Please RSVP here or on the Natives meetup if you plan to attend. Entry tickets for the event are $10.00 per person and may be purchased on the Redsoxnatives site or at the door. Your purchase gets you 10 raffle tickets! 

Participating groups include:

Red Sox Natives

Boston Happy Hour

Wakefield Weeknights

North Shore Womens Group, 

North Shore (Beverly Area) Social Group

Single Geeks, Nerds and Professionals

Social Fun

North Shore Separated and Divorced Support Group 

 

See you on Saturday, March 24.

Fenway Frank and the Natives Team
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Scoreboard hostess to direct you to the Red Sox Natives section. All are encouraged to wear Red Sox gear.
item.name: Red Sox Natives 2012 Spring Training Kickoff Happy Hour & Spike The Punch Band
